channel.title: Set it so admins + cant pk?

item.title: Set it so admins + cant pk?
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“usman555, post:9, topic:341319”]lol i love to see reactions.
Anyways, don’t you know if you do Jc’s code you are stopping owners from pking. Which includes you, as you are an owner.
So my code is defended

if (playerRights == 2) { // Stuff. } else { sMsg("Administrators cannot attack others in the wild!"); }

makes admins only not be able to fight.[/quote]
Your code:

If player rights are 2, then let them PK.
ELSE, if player rights are not 2, then they don’t get to peekay. Durr.

@topic:

if (playerRights !=2) { // Let them attack. } else { // sMsg - Administrators cannot attack other players. }

Read full topic
item.source: Set it so admins + cant pk?

item.title: Set it so admins + cant pk?
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

lol i love to see reactions.
Anyways, don’t you know if you do Jc’s code you are stopping owners from pking. Which includes you, as you are an owner.
So my code is defended

if (playerRights == 2) { // Stuff. } else { sMsg("Administrators cannot attack others in the wild!"); }

makes admins only not be able to fight.

Read full topic
item.source: Set it so admins + cant pk?

item.title: Set it so admins + cant pk?
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“usman555, post:6, topic:341319”][quote author=Jc22493 link=topic=437717.msg3216815#msg3216815 date=1274745113]
Under the attacking packet, whichever that is, add something like:

if (playerRights < 2) { // Stuff. } else { sMsg("Administrators cannot attack others in the wild!"); }
[/quote]

You made a mistake, < is smaller than admin, so normals and mods cant attack

make it like this: playerRights == 2) {

fixed version:

if (playerRights == 2) { // Stuff. } else { sMsg("Administrators cannot attack others in the wild!"); }[/quote]
With your conditions, only administrators can attack in the wild.

Read full topic
item.source: Set it so admins + cant pk?

make it like this: playerRights == 2) {

He said admin+
Jc was right.
